text: @Alyssa_Milano If the primary is over and it's time to unite to defeat Trump, then act like it. Seems like a lot of Biden supporters know in their hearts that opposing #MedicareForAll during the #CoronavirusPandemic is inhumane & indefensible and don't want to be reminded of it.
